outputs.output_descr: To contribute to the enhancement of poverty reduction and sustainable development in The Gambia through the provision of support to the implementation, coordination and monitoring of an MDG-based Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy (PRGS), while strengthening national and local capacities for monitoring progress, coordinate implementation and aid resources and mobilising resources for poverty reduction towards the attainment of MDGs.

project_descr: MDGs-Based Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy implementation, coordination and monitoring
project_title: MDGs- Based Poverty Reduction and Growth Strategy Implem

subnational.name: Gambia, Ministry of Finance and Economic Affairs (MOFEA), Kotu
